item.title: Goodbye R, Hello Python! ...Wait, hello R?
item.description: Using python in R! Are you in a statistics class using R and wondering “WHY on earth are we learning Python now?!” R is easy to learn, convenient, and has a great user interface. If you are anything like me, coding is not your forte, and the thought of learning ANOTHER coding platform is terrifying. But I’ve got your answer! What’s super interesting about Python is that you can use it within R.
